definition: loss of love/breakup of a relationship
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: So it denotes that: "article changes with emotion". This article embodies profound connotation from the literary angle.
sentences.chinese: 他的“文以情变”的思想有着深刻的内涵。

marriage arranged following a pregnancy/marriage necessitated by an unplanned pregnancy

to part company/to split up/to break up
